name: LFE Capital
overview:
LFE Capital invests in businesses with revenues of $5 to $50 million that need capital to support a plan of rapid growth. Uses of capital include working capital to accelerate growth, acquisitions, and liquidity for shareholders.

LFE Capital was founded in 1999 by Leslie FrÃ©con and has two funds under management. Based in Minneapolis, LFE Capital is a private equity fund manager that provides flexible financial solutions for Midwest-based companies with strong growth prospects. A relationship with LFE brings expansion or buyout capital and an operations oriented investor who will dedicate the time and resources required to help build successful businesses.

funding_round.source_description: Portero Raises $6.6 Million Round For Online Luxury Goods Marketplace
